name: Yawar Abass
title: Frontend Developer & AI Enthusiast
summary: Creative and detail-oriented frontend developer with a strong passion for crafting visually appealing and performant web applications. Experienced in building scalable, interactive UIs using React, Next.js, and TypeScript. Exploring AI-powered features for smarter web experiences.

experience.description: Developed a content-driven website using Next.js and Tailwind CSS integrated with WordPress as a headless CMS. Implemented responsive layouts, dynamic routing, and SEO optimizations for fast global indexing. Collaborated with designers to build a visually engaging user interface.

Built a dynamic marketing platform using Next.js, Sanity CMS, and shadcn/ui components. Integrated Google Analytics and SEO meta-tags for marketing insights. Improved performance by implementing static site generation and image optimization.

Developed several small-scale web applications including an AI image enhancer and a blog CMS. Used Next.js with MongoDB and Prisma ORM for backend logic and Clerk for authentication. Deployed projects on Vercel with CI/CD pipelines.

Built an AI-powered image SaaS platform using Next.js, Cloudinary APIs, and Clerk authentication. Implemented AI-based image editing features like restoration, recoloring, and object removal. Integrated Stripe payments for subscription-based access.

experience.company: Academic Research Project – Cervical Cancer Classification
experience.description: Worked on a deep learning project using PyTorch for cervical cell image classification. Experimented with CNN architectures and Vision Transformers (ViT). Achieved 92% accuracy using a fine-tuned pretrained model. Documented and presented findings in a research paper.
Actively contributed to open-source projects related to Next.js UI libraries and AI integration. Fixed documentation, improved code readability, and optimized React components for accessibility.

projects.name: AI Resume Builder
projects.description: Created an AI-driven resume generator that dynamically suggests improvements and restructures content for better readability. Includes PDF export and live preview.

projects.name: Stock Vision
projects.description: Built a stock market prediction dashboard that visualizes trends and price movements using AI-based time-series models (LSTM, Transformer).

projects.name: NextAuth Demo App
projects.description: Implemented Google OAuth authentication with role-based access control and JWT session handling in a modern Next.js app.

education.details: Focused on full-stack development, AI/ML, and cloud computing. Completed major projects on deep learning and web architecture.

education.university: Islamia College of Science and Commerce
education.details: Built multiple academic projects using Java, MySQL, and Python. Participated in hackathons and web design competitions.
Specialized in Physics, Chemistry, and Computer Science. Developed an early interest in programming and web development.

awards.name: Top 10 Projects – DeveloperWeek Hackathon
awards.description: Recognized for creating an innovative AI image enhancement tool using Next.js and Cloudinary APIs.

awards.name: Best Research Presentation – AI in Healthcare
awards.description: Awarded for a project on cervical cancer image classification using Vision Transformers.
